mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.from_group_id AS "fromGroupId", a.from_create_by AS "fromCreateBy", a.from_create_name AS "fromCreateName", a.deal_date AS "dealDate", a.to_create_by AS "toCreateBy", a.to_create_name AS "toCreateName", a.to_group_id AS "toGroupId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
insert into project_transfer
id, project_id, project_name, from_group_id, from_create_by, from_create_name, deal_date, to_create_by, to_create_name, to_group_id, create_date, del_flag,
#{id}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{fromGroupId}, #{fromCreateBy}, #{fromCreateName}, #{dealDate}, #{toCreateBy}, #{toCreateName}, #{toGroupId}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag},
mapper.delete: update project_transfer set del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where id = #{id}
